dcterms:description: The dataset consists of noisy-clean pairs generated for the INTERSPEECH 2020 DNS Challenge, used to evaluate speech enhancement models.

dcterms:description: The dataset includes a large amount of noisy speech data generated for the ICASSP 2022 DNS Challenge, used for training and evaluating speech enhancement models.
dcterms:title: ICASSP 2022 DNS Challenge (DNS-2022)
